bibl.title: Michigan Papyri. Volume IV, Part I. Tax Rolls from Karanis. Part I. Text.

series.title: University of Michigan Studies. Humanistic Series.

bibl.seg: Youtie Herbert C., Verne B. Schuman and Orsamus M. Pearl, Michigan Papyri. Volume IV, Part I. Tax Rolls from Karanis. Part I. Text. (University of Michigan Studies. Humanistic Series. XLII.)
Ann Arbor, The University of Michigan Press, 1936, 4°, xvi-437 pp. et 4 pll.

C.R. par BAssBudé 9 (1937) Suppl. crit., p. 102. - H.I. Bell, CR 51 (1937) p. 240; - JRS 27 (1937) pp. 280-282. - Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 17 (1937) pp. 113-114. - Paul Collart, REG 50 (1937) pp. 396-397; - RPhil 12 (1938) pp. 184-185. - Giuseppe Ghedini, Athenaeum N.S., 17 (1939) p. 311. - E.R. Hardy, CP 35 (1940) pp. 228-229. - Henri Henne, REA 39 (1937), pp. 343-346. - A.Ch. Johnson, AJP 59 (1938) pp. 369-370; - Michigan Alumnus Quarterly Review 43 (1937) pp. 667-668. - Heinz Kortenbeutel, DLZ 59 (1938) coll. 1518-1520. - Naphtali Lewis, CJ 33 (1938) pp. 365-366. - J.G. Milne, JHS 58 (1938) pp. 113-114. - Orsolina Montevecchi, BFC 9 (1937) pp. 6-8. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 12 (1937) No. 24, pp. 279-281. - S.L. Wallace, AHR 44 (1938) p. 177. - C.B. Welles, AJA 41 (1937) pp. 508-509. - Ulrich Wilcken, ArchPF 12 (1937) pp. 241-242. - Herbert C. Youtie, CW 30 (1937) pp. 199-201 [reproduit dans: Scriptiunculae. II (Amsterdam, 1973) 59, pp. 851-857]. - Friedrich Zucker, Gnomon 14 (1938) pp. 388-389.
